RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 06 Deputy General Manager and Other Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 17:35 IST
 Rail India Technical and Economic Services
 6 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Haryana |  Salary : 189,000 to 362,000




FOLLOW

The Rail India Technical and Economic Services (RITES) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Deputy General Manager, Group General Manager Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Haryana.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Deputy General Manager	03	B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Mechanical Engineering
Group General Manager	03

RITES Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age: 21 Years.
The maximum age: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 1,89,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 3,62,000/- per month.
How to apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the RITES Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	14-08-2025
Closing date	28-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
